about_the_game:
Turis Station - Your Autons Destiny is somewhat in your hands

ABOUT THIS GAME

Awaken as a “soulless” Auton in Turis Station, a retro-inspired sci-fi fantasy adventure adrift in the cosmic flow. Powered by an emotional Soul Engine, every choice you make—from trading with quirky Wizards to fishing for cosmic treasures—shapes your personality, unlocks story paths, and determines the fate of this vibrant post-scarcity station.

Explore a Melting Pot of Magic & Tech
Roam the station’s immersive 3D environments and stylized pixel-art sectors. Encounter unforgettable characters like Lloyd Baxter and the eccentric Wizards of Amazetown as you collect rare artifacts, gather Blueprints, and build an ever-growing collection. Whether you’re diving into cosmic fishing expeditions or unearthing lost lore, each decision brings you closer to Turis Station’s hidden destiny.

Master “Remnants,” the Station’s Card Game
Challenge NPCs (and your friends) in fast-paced matches of Remnants. Assemble decks from your in-game discoveries—each item can become a powerful card, adding a creative twist to your journey. Win or lose, every match weaves into the rich tapestry of Turis Station’s culture and story.

FEATURES

  • Dynamic Storytelling powered by your evolving Soul Engine

  • Collectible Economy: Gather artifacts, trade with Wizards, and craft Blueprints

  • Immersive Setting: Stylized pixel art meets nostalgic 90s-inspired 3D environments

  • Addictive Card Game: Build decks from your in-game collectibles in Remnants

  • Deep Lore & Characters: Intertwined quests, comedic moments, and cosmic secrets

  • Original Soundtrack multiple genres with hours of original compositions

  • Host private worlds : 128+ players all living together in the cosmic flow

  • Twitch Integration : Streamer friendly

Are you ready to shape your Auton’s destiny—one BLAND can at a time?

Wishlist now and embark on a journey that blends retro charm, cosmic wonder, and the infinite possibilities of Turis Station!
